OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

REdit.label: Parameter to edit
REdit.tooltip: Parameter to edit responses via chat (NOT FUNCTIONAL YET)

ResponseList.label: List of responses
ResponseList.tooltip: Parameter to receive a list of all possible responses

R1C.label: R1 command
R1C.tooltip: Parameter to toggle command to response 1

R2C.label: R2 command
R2C.tooltip: Parameter to toggle command to response 2

R3C.label: R3 command
R3C.tooltip: Parameter to toggle command to response 3

R4C.label: R4 command
R4C.tooltip: Parameter to toggle command to response 4

R5C.label: R5 command
R5C.tooltip: Parameter to toggle command to response 5

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level to toggle the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

OnCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

OnUserCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

ToggleMsg.label: Message when command has been toggled

R1Msg.label: R1 Message
R1Msg.tooltip: Response for when command is set to R1

R2Msg.label: R2 Message
R2Msg.tooltip: Response for when command is set to R2

R3Msg.label: R3 Message
R3Msg.tooltip: Response for when command is set to R3

R4Msg.label: R4 Message
R4Msg.tooltip: Response for when command is set to R4

R5Msg.label: R5 Message
R5Msg.tooltip: Response for when command is set to R5

NotEnoughResponse.label: Not enough currency response
NotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have enough points! 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Currency name 
 {2} = command name 
 {3} = command cost
